io.jeo.sql

Class Backend

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.sql.Backend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Backend

    public abstract class Backend
extends Object
implements Closeable
    DB abstraction layer.
    Author:
    Ian Schneider

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Backend.Results
      Wrapper for database API result set or cursor.
      class  Backend.Session
      A Session is an API adapter to a DB backend query session.

      • canRunScripts

        public boolean canRunScripts()
        Return true if the backend can run scripts loaded via Class.getResourceAsStream
        Returns:

      • closeInternal

        protected abstract void closeInternal(Object object)
                               throws Exception
        The implementation should support closing any non-Closeable object passed in and does not need to check for nulls. Use closeSafe(java.lang.Object) instead of directly calling this method.
        Parameters:
        object - the non-null object to close
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs closing

      • closeSafe

        public final void closeSafe(Object o)
        Close an object created by this Backend. Accepts null.
        Parameters:
        o - object or null
